segment.source: The following checklists include tasks for configuring connection security rules and IPsec settings in your GPOs for servers in an isolated server zone that are part of an isolated domain.
segment.target: The following checklists include tasks for configuring connection security rules and IPsec settings in your GPOs for servers in an isolated server zone that are part of an isolated domain.

segment.source: For information about creating a standalone isolated server zone that is not part of an isolated domain, see Checklist: Implementing a Standalone Server Isolation Policy Design.
segment.target: For information about creating a standalone isolated server zone that is not part of an isolated domain, see Checklist: Implementing a Standalone Server Isolation Policy Design.

segment.source: In addition to requiring authentication and optionally encryption, servers in an isolated server zone can be accessed only by users or devices who are authenticated members of a network access group (NAG).
segment.target: In addition to requiring authentication and optionally encryption, servers in an isolated server zone can be accessed only by users or devices who are authenticated members of a network access group (NAG).

segment.source: If you include user accounts in the NAG, then the restrictions can still apply; they are just enforced at the application layer, rather than the IP layer.
segment.target: If you include user accounts in the NAG, then the restrictions can still apply; they are just enforced at the application layer, rather than the IP layer.

segment.source: Devices that are running at least Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008 can identify both devices and users in the NAG because IPsec in these versions of Windows supports AuthIP in addition to IKE.
segment.target: Devices that are running at least Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008 can identify both devices and users in the NAG because IPsec in these versions of Windows supports AuthIP in addition to IKE.

segment.source: AuthIP adds support for user-based authentication.
segment.target: AuthIP adds support for user-based authentication.

segment.source: The GPOs for an isolated server or group of servers are similar to those for the isolated domain itself or the encryption zone, if you require encryption to your isolated servers.
segment.target: The GPOs for an isolated server or group of servers are similar to those for the isolated domain itself or the encryption zone, if you require encryption to your isolated servers.

segment.source: This checklist refers you to procedures for creating rules as well as restrictions that allow only members of the NAG to connect to the server.
segment.target: This checklist refers you to procedures for creating rules as well as restrictions that allow only members of the NAG to connect to the server.

segment.source: Create a GPO for the devices that need to have access restricted to the same set of client devices.
segment.target: Create a GPO for the devices that need to have access restricted to the same set of client devices.

segment.source: If there are multiple servers and they run different versions of the Windows operating system, then start by creating the GPO for one version of Windows.
segment.target: If there are multiple servers and they run different versions of the Windows operating system, then start by creating the GPO for one version of Windows.

segment.source: After you have finished the tasks in this checklist and configured the GPO for that version of Windows, you can create a copy of it.
segment.target: After you have finished the tasks in this checklist and configured the GPO for that version of Windows, you can create a copy of it.

segment.source: Copy the GPO from the isolated domain or from the encryption zone to serve as a starting point.
segment.target: Copy the GPO from the isolated domain or from the encryption zone to serve as a starting point.

segment.source: Where your copy already contains elements listed in the following checklist, review the relevant procedures and compare them to your copied GPO’s element to make sure it is constructed in a way that meets the needs of the server isolation zone.
segment.target: Where your copy already contains elements listed in the following checklist, review the relevant procedures and compare them to your copied GPO’s element to make sure it is constructed in a way that meets the needs of the server isolation zone.

segment.source: Create a rule that requests authentication for all network traffic.
segment.target: Create a rule that requests authentication for all network traffic.

segment.source: Important: Just as in an isolated domain, do not set the rules to require authentication for inbound traffic until you have completed testing.
segment.target: Important: Just as in an isolated domain, do not set the rules to require authentication for inbound traffic until you have completed testing.

segment.source: That way, if the rules do not work as expected, communications are not affected by a failure to authenticate.
segment.target: That way, if the rules do not work as expected, communications are not affected by a failure to authenticate.
